data.label: Google Play Service
data.description: 借助 Google Play 服务，您的应用可以利用由 Google 提供的最新功能，例如地图，Google+ 等，并通过 Google Play 商店以 APK 的形式分发自动平台更新。 这样一来，您的用户可以更快地接收更新，并且可以更轻松地集成 Google 必须提供的最新信息。

data.label: Google Play Service
data.description: With Google Play services, your app can take advantage of the latest features provided by Google, such as maps and Google+, and distribute automatic platform updates via the Google Play store in APK form. This allows your users to receive updates more quickly and integrates the latest information Google has to offer more easily.
